messages.content: You are tasked with creating a structured output from the provided user message.

Files containing the implementation of App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\MediaController@index

- app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/MediaController.php

Explanation of results

- The API route /v1/media is wired to App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\MediaController@index in routes/api.php. Specifically, the route registration shows:

  - Route::apiResource('media', MediaController::class)->only(['index']); (outside the authenticated group)

  This indicates that the index method of MediaController handles GET requests to /v1/media.

- I located the implementation in app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/MediaController.php. The file defines the index method as:

  - It returns a paginated collection of Media items via MediaLibrary::first()->media()->paginate(limit), wrapped in a MediaResource collection (MediaResource::collection(...)).

  - The method uses the request parameter limit (default 20) to control pagination.

- Therefore, the handler implementation for App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\MediaController@index resides solely in app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/MediaController.php. No other files contain the index method implementation for this controller.

files.description: List of paths to the files that contain the handler implementations.
